entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart is introduced as a character who is striding towards Harry and the others, wearing turquoise robes. He is described as jovial and thundering.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being pinned to Gilderoy Lockhart's side and burning with humiliation. He is also referred to as 'Mr Creevey' by Lockhart.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is introduced as a character who slides smirking back into the crowd.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is mentioned as being called by Lockhart to take a double portrait with him.

relationships.description: Gilderoy Lockhart has his arm around Harry's shoulders, indicating that he is accompanying him.
Lockhart beaming at Colin and offering to sign a double portrait with him.
